panels.description: The total cost incurred from resource usage, excluding credits or discounts.

targets.rawSql:
select ROUND(total::numeric, 2) || '$' as cost from aws_cost__total
where type = 'Usage'

panels.title: Total Usage Cost

panels.description: The total cost offset by credits or discounts, reducing the overall cost.

targets.rawSql:
select ROUND(total::numeric, 2) || '$' as cost from aws_cost__total
where type = 'Credit'

panels.title: Total Credit Cost

panels.description: The total cost including both usage and credit costs, reflecting the actual amount paid.

targets.rawSql:
select ROUND(total::numeric, 2) || '$' as cost from aws_cost__total
where type = 'Overall'

panels.title: Overall Cost

panels.description: The total count of resources considered in the cost analysis.

targets.rawSql: select count(*) from aws_cost__by_resources

panels.title: Total number of Resources

panels.description: A time series chart showing the trend of overall costs over a period of time, indicating how costs have changed over time.

targets.rawSql: select * from aws_cost__over_time_date

panels.title: Overall Cost Trend over Time

panels.description: A visual breakdown of costs by AWS service, showing the proportion of costs attributed to each service.

targets.rawSql: select * from aws_cost__by_product

panels.title: Cost Distribution per Service in AWS

panels.description: A graphical representation of costs per AWS service, displaying the cost amount for each service in a bar format.

targets.rawSql: select * from aws_cost__by_product

panels.title: Cost Breakdown per Service in AWS

panels.description: A donut chart illustrating the distribution of costs among different AWS accounts.

targets.rawSql: select * from aws_cost__by_account

panels.title: Cost Distribution per Account in AWS

panels.description: A pie chart displaying the distribution of costs across AWS regions, showcasing the proportion of costs in each region.

targets.rawSql: select * from aws_cost__by_regions

panels.title: Cost Distribution per Region in AWS

panels.description: A bar plot highlighting the top 10 resources that incur the highest costs in AWS, showing the cost amount for each resource.

targets.rawSql:
select * from aws_cost__by_resources
order by cost desc
LIMIT 10

panels.title: Top 10 Most Costly Resources in AWS

panels.description: A table listing the top 10 resources with the highest costs in AWS.

targets.rawSql:
select line_item_resource_id as resource_id, line_item_product_code as service, cost  from aws_cost__by_resources
order by cost desc
LIMIT 10

panels.title: Top 10 Most Costly Resources in AWS

panels.description: Displays the total count of EC2 instances.

targets.rawSql: select * from aws_cost__ec2_instance_count

panels.title: EC2 Instance count

panels.description: Shows the total cost associated with EC2 instances.

targets.rawSql: select ROUND(total_cost::numeric, 2) || '$' as cost from aws_cost__ec2_overall_cost

panels.title: Total EC2 Cost

panels.description: Breaks down the cost based on the type of EC2 instances.

targets.rawSql: select * from aws_cost__ec2_cost_by_instance_type

panels.title: Cost by Instance Type

panels.description: Shows the trend of EC2 costs over a specific period.

targets.rawSql: select * from aws_cost__ec2_cost_over_time

panels.title: Cost Trend over Time

panels.description: Provides the status of EC2 instances.

targets.rawSql: select * from aws_cost__ec2_instance_status

panels.title: EC2 Instane Status

panels.description: Lists the top 10 EC2 instances with the highest costs.

targets.rawSql:
select * from aws_cost__ec2_cost_breakdown
order by cost desc
LIMIT 10

panels.title: Top 10 Most Costly EC2 Instances in AWS

panels.description: Displays the cost distribution across different AWS regions.

targets.rawSql: select * from aws_cost__ec2_cost_by_region

panels.title: Cost by Region

panels.description: Displays the most utilized EC2 instances based on metrics like CPU utilization. It includes the instance ARN, instance type, mean utilization, and associated cost.

targets.rawSql: select * from aws_cost__ec2_instance_utilization_cost

panels.title: Top Utilized Instances

panels.description: Lists the top 10 EC2 instances with the highest costs.

targets.rawSql:
select * from aws_cost__ec2_cost_breakdown
order by cost desc
LIMIT 10

panels.title: Top 10 Most Costly EC2 Instances in AWS

panels.description: Highlights potential cost-saving opportunities for EC2 instances based on optimization recommendations.

targets.rawSql: select * from ec2_instances_optimization_recommendations

panels.title: Cost Savings Opportunities - optimization recommendations

panels.description: Displays the most utilized EC2 instances based on metrics like CPU utilization. It includes the instance ARN, instance type, mean utilization, and associated cost.

targets.rawSql: select * from aws_cost__ec2_instance_utilization_cost

panels.title: Top Utilized Instances

panels.description: Displays cost-saving opportunities identified by AWS Trusted Advisor.

targets.rawSql:
select account_id, arn, category, id, name, description, status from aws_cost__trusted_advisior_by_arn
where arn like '%ec2%'

panels.title: Cost Savings Opportunities - trusted advisor

targets.rawSql:
SELECT SUM(cost) as total_cost
FROM (
(SELECT DISTINCT arn, cost FROM aws_cost__by_under_utilized_resources)
UNION
(SELECT distinct resource_id, cost from aws_cost__by_unused_resources)
) all_resources

SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT arn) as number_of_under_utilized_resources
FROM aws_cost__by_under_utilized_resources

SELECT SUM(cost) as total_cost
FROM (SELECT DISTINCT arn, cost FROM aws_cost__by_under_utilized_resources) unique_resources

SELECT count(distinct resource_id)
FROM aws_cost__by_unused_resources

SELECT SUM(cost) as total_cost
FROM (SELECT distinct resource_id, cost from aws_cost__by_unused_resources) unique_resources

with unique_resources as (
  SELECT DISTINCT service, arn, cost 
  FROM aws_cost__by_under_utilized_resources
)

SELECT service, (SUM(cost) / (SELECT SUM(cost) FROM unique_resources)) as cost_perc
FROM unique_resources
GROUP BY service

panels.title: Cost of Under-Utilized Resources Split by Service

targets.rawSql:
with unique_resources as (
  SELECT DISTINCT resource_type, resource_id, cost 
  FROM aws_cost__by_unused_resources
)

SELECT resource_type, (SUM(cost) / (SELECT SUM(cost) FROM unique_resources)) as cost_perc
FROM unique_resources
GROUP BY resource_type

panels.title: Cost of Unused Resources Split by Resource Type

targets.rawSql:
with unique_resources as (
  SELECT DISTINCT service, arn, cost 
  FROM aws_cost__by_under_utilized_resources
)

SELECT service, SUM(cost) as cost
FROM unique_resources
GROUP BY service

panels.title: Cost of Under-Utilized Resources Per Service

targets.rawSql:
with unique_resources as (
  SELECT DISTINCT resource_type, resource_id, cost 
  FROM aws_cost__by_unused_resources
)

SELECT resource_type, SUM(cost) total_cost
FROM unique_resources
GROUP BY resource_type

panels.title: Cost of Unused Resources Per Resource Type

targets.rawSql:
SELECT service, arn, metric,
ROUND(CAST((mean_usage * 100) AS numeric), 2)::text || '%' as "Average Usage",
ROUND(CAST((max_usage * 100) AS numeric), 2)::text || '%' as "Max Usage",
cost
FROM aws_cost__by_under_utilized_resources ORDER BY cost DESC
SELECT * FROM aws_cost__by_unused_resources ORDER BY cost DESC
